gov.va.med.lom.foundation.util

Class MessagesStringBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.lom.foundation.util.MessagesStringBuilder

  • public class MessagesStringBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Concatenates the resource bundle text of messages appended to this MessagesStringBuilder. Error and informational are messages are concatenated separatedly and can be requested separately.

                           java.lang.Class clazz)
        Append all messages.
        Parameters:
        messages - The messages
        clazz - The class used to search for the messages bundle
        Returns:
        This MessagsStringBuilder, such that append() calls can be concatenated.

      • appendInformationalMessages

        public void appendInformationalMessages(Messages messages,
                               java.lang.Class clazz)
        Append only informational messages. This can be used to e.g. create info log output.
        Parameters:
        messages - The messages to get the informational messages from
        clazz - The class used to search for the messages bundle

      • getErrorString

        public java.lang.String getErrorString()
        Concatenates all error messages appended to this MessagsStringBuilder into a single string.
        Returns:
        The string with all the messages.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Convcatenates all error and informational messages appended to this MessagsStringBuilder into a single string. The error and informational messages are separated by a newline.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The string with all the messages.
